sentences.en: Bigger staggered back against the wall breathless for a moment.
sentences.cn: 别格踉跄着退到墙边,一时喘不过气来.

sentences.en: By the end of the walk, she was breathless with exertion.
sentences.cn: 走到最后, 她累得上气不接下气.

sentences.en: Chess fans around the globe watched the match with breathless interest.
sentences.cn: 全世界的棋迷都屏息静观这场棋赛.

sentences.en: He arrived breathless at the top of the stairs.
sentences.cn: 他爬上楼梯顶时气喘吁吁的。

sentences.en: He forged ahead, panting and breathless.
sentences.cn: 他气喘吁吁地向前奔跑.

sentences.en: I was a little breathless and my heartbeat was bumpy and fast.
sentences.cn: 我有点儿喘不上气，心脏咚咚地快速跳动着。

sentences.en: John was breathless after running for half a mile.
sentences.cn: 约翰跑了半英里后就气喘吁吁.

sentences.en: She sounded breathless, as if nervous but trying not to be.
sentences.cn: 她说起话来上气不接下气, 而且极力压抑着紧张的心情.

sentences.en: She was hot and breathless from the exertion of cycling uphill.
sentences.cn: 她骑车上山累得全身发热，喘不过气来。

sentences.en: She was hot and breathless from the exertion of cycling uphill.
sentences.cn: 由于用力骑车爬坡, 她浑身发热,

sentences.en: Stooping, he stared at him in breathless and frozen ferocity.
sentences.cn: 他弯下身躯,盯着他, 满脸凶相,令人失魂落魄,毛骨悚然.

sentences.en: Tech-nology has advanced at a breathless pace.
sentences.cn: 技术进步速度惊人，日新月异。

sentences.en: the breathless heat of a midsummer night in Rome
sentences.cn: 罗马仲夏夜令人窒息的暑气

sentences.en: The long climb left Jan feeling breathless.
sentences.cn: 攀爬了那么长时间，简感到喘不过气来。

sentences.en: The river is glassing in a breathless calm.
sentences.cn: 河水在无风的宁静中显得光滑如镜.

sentences.en: Watching him climb up the precipice, everybody was breathless with anxiety.
sentences.cn: 看着他往悬崖上爬, 大家都捏一把汗.
